Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People have shared on social media their excitement over the allocation of land for the Winnam Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Corporation who will use it to create a new aged care facility including palliative care funded by the Albanese Federal Government. Another post celebrated the repurpose of an old hospital site cutting by the previous government being transformed into an Indigenous health and aged care hub with a new nearby health centre open 24/7. Finally one post shed light on First Nations people having cancer as the leading cause of disease-related death which will be addressed in the upcoming budget along with smoking and vaping amongst the same community.
